main event: Mrs. Z___ and Mr. Z___ reported a sighting of a bright circular object emitting sparks in the Ocala sky on November 7, 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed for 15-20 minutes,The witnesses described the object as being circular in shape and traveling at a high rate of speed,The object changed course suddenly from north to southwest before disappearing,No aircraft were reported in the area during the sighting,The Ocala Air Force Base was notified of the sighting and communicated it to MacDill Air Force Base.
